TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division C Regional 6
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.125.cipherString: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the lustre of it will never appear.
CIPHER.125.question: The following quote by Daniel Defoe has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to solve.

CIPHER.144.cipherString: I fully appreciate the present peril the country is in, and the weight of responsibility on me.
CIPHER.144.question: A quote by Abraham Lincoln has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K3 alphabet.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode it?

CIPHER.135.cipherString: Cuando tu vida esté en crisis y no estés seguro de qué hacer, mira en lo más profundo de tu alma y te guiará.
CIPHER.135.question: A quote by Charles E Hudson has been translated into Spanish and encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet with an English keyword.  What was the Spanish Translation?
CIPHER.135.translation: When your life is in turmoil and your not sure what to do, look deep inside your soul it will guide you thru.

CIPHER.149.cipherString: That was the week that was.
CIPHER.149.question: The following phrase by John Bird was encoded as a Hill cipher with a keyword of TOIL.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.129.cipherString: Teh hgihest intallex, like teh tops of mountains, are the frist to ctach an two reflect teh dawn.
CIPHER.129.question: Your friend who can't spell or type very well is trying to offer you some advice which has then been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they actually type in?

CIPHER.133.cipherString: Life doesn't require ideals. It requires standards of action.
CIPHER.133.question: The following symbols are a Baconian cipher of a quote by Haruki Murakami.  What did they say?

CIPHER.127.cipherString: The greatest pleasure I know, is to do a good action by stealth, and to have it found out by accident.
CIPHER.127.question: The following quote by Charles Lamb was encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.139.cipherString: I feel like I'm diagonally parked in a parallel universe.
CIPHER.139.question: The following quote has been encoded using a Fractionated Morse Cipher.  You are told that the decoded text ends with VERSE.  What is the full quote?

CIPHER.143.question: Solve the following Cryptarithm and use the mapping to decode what 4510287 6339 says.

CIPHER.136.cipherString: If you read good books, you will be well-informed.
CIPHER.136.question: A quote by Lailah Gifty Akita has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=×, 2=–, 3=●, 4=–, 5=●

CIPHER.137.cipherString: What is an alien's favorite candy? A Mars bar!
CIPHER.137.question: An interesting question has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=××, 2=●×, 3=––, 4=●●, 5=–×

CIPHER.134.cipherString: It is not how long the music last but how much we enjoy.
CIPHER.134.question: The following strange sentences are a Baconian quote by Lailah Gifty Akita that starts with ITIS.  What did they say?

CIPHER.128.cipherString: The world can only be grasped by action, not by contemplation...The hand is the cutting edge of the mind.
CIPHER.128.question: the following quote by Jacob Bronowski has been encoded with a K2 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.148.question: Encode the following quote by Brian Clark using a Hill Cipher with a keyword of HINT.

CIPHER.145.cipherString: Evil thoughts intrude in an unemployed mind, as naturally as worms are generated in a stagnant pool.
CIPHER.145.question: An quote derived from a Latin proverb has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What was the key phrase used to encode the quote?

CIPHER.130.cipherString: Perfect is determined in shortened measures of time, not over long periods of time or lifetimes. It would be unnatural.
CIPHER.130.question: A quote by A W. Somerset Maugham has been encoded as an Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.132.cipherString: For sale: Watch with half a face. For a limited time only.
CIPHER.132.question: The following words are a Baconian cipher of a quote.  What does it say?

CIPHER.141.cipherString: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.
CIPHER.141.question: The following quote by Roy T. Bennett needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of EPIC

CIPHER.126.cipherString: Intelligence is like an underwear. It is important that you have it, but not necessary that you show it off.
CIPHER.126.question: Some sage advice has been offered in the for of an Aristocrat.  What is it?

CIPHER.147.cipherString: These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.
CIPHER.147.question: A quote by Najwa Zebian has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 5 rails were used to encode it.  What did they say?

CIPHER.142.question: By solving the following Aristocrat, you will find the key to decoding the word that corresponds to 320846719.  What is it?

CIPHER.131.cipherString: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.
CIPHER.131.question: The following quote by Maya Angelou has been encoded as a  Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.138.cipherString: Money talks ...but all mine ever says is good-bye.
CIPHER.138.question: A quote has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=×●, 3=×–, 5=××, 7=●×, 9=●●

CIPHER.140.cipherString: What will fall on the lawn first? An autumn leaf or a Christmas catalog?
CIPHER.140.question: The following quote needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SNOW.

CIPHER.146.cipherString: Treat everyone in every situation with kindness; it is the ultimate purpose and wisdom of life.
CIPHER.146.question: The following quote by Debasish Mridha, M.D. has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode it?
